decks.notes: This control deck focuses on disrupting opponents with removal, counterspells, and resource denial while also generating card advantage and outvaluing them in the late game. The deck aims to control the board with a mix of removal spells, counterspells, and powerful creatures like The Wandering Emperor and Sunfall. It also utilizes card draw and token generation engines like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Caretaker's Talent to maintain card advantage and board presence. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color requirements while also providing utility lands for additional value.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on early creature aggression and burn spells to quickly defeat the opponent. With a low mana curve and efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Emberheart Challenger, combined with direct damage spells like Monstrous Rage and Reckless Rage, this deck aims to push the opponent on the back foot from the beginning of the game. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion provides additional mana ramp and flexibility in the deck construction. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, unrelenting attacks and burn damage.
